masthead: 科教文卫新闻·体育新闻

text.text: 539　MEDALS，INCLUDING 168 GOLDS，WILLBE AWARDED IN THE FIRST EAST ASIAN GAMES.
第一届东亚运动会共设奖牌539枚，金牌168枚。
A: About 2,000 athletes will take pat in the FirstEast Asian Games.How many medals will be awarded?
约有2，000名运动员参加第一届东亚运动会。这次共设多少奖牌?
B:539　medals,including 168 goids,will be awardedin the First East Asian Games.
第一届东亚运动会共设奖牌539枚，金牌168枚。
A:Ah,gold medals!It must be very exciting to getone.
啊，金牌!获得块金牌很令人激动。
B:But it will be more exciting just towatch these games.
但观看这些比赛更令人激动。
